body:
@wheelcomplex, thanks.

I see your core file size is unlimited, so you should be getting core dumps from these crashes. Could you change into the directory of one of the failed tests (e.g., either `$GOROOT/test` or `$GOROOT/test/fixedbugs`) and run gdb on the core file (e.g., `gdb /home/rhinofly/home/sandspace/official-go/pkg/tool/freebsd_386/compile core`) and then post the output of the `backtrace` command?
